item.title: Olivia in Action
item.description: Press play below and cross your fingers

item.title: Minecraft Update 0.15
item.description:
I love Minecraft. Yesterday there was an update (0.15) that was really cool.

They added horses and a lead so you can walk your horse. They also added fire charge which makes a cool fire. Texture packs have also been added and my favourite is called Plastic Texture Pack. But I haven’t got it yet because you have to pay for it.

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Hi, I’m Olivia. Welcome to my blog!

I’m in year one and I am the second shortest in the class. I like school because I have lots of friends.

I like to play minecraft. When I am a bit older, I’d like to play hockey because it looks fun.
